mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(no, name, pwd, title, email, content) values(#{no}, #{name},#{pwd},#{title},#{email},#{content})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where ${searchCondition} like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{no} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select * from board order by no desc )
where rownum<=6
